channel.title: general on ecmccfg
channel.description: Recent content in general on ecmccfg

item.title: chkOverSampFactOrDie.cmd
item.description: description Validates requested oversampling factor details Checks if requested oversampling factor is valid otherwise exits EPICS/ECMC author Anders Sandstroem

item.title: chkOverSampTimeOrDie.cmd
item.description: description Validates the resulting sampling time for oversampling slaves. details Checks if the resulting sampling time for oversampling slaves is higher or equal to the minimum time. author Anders Sandstroem

item.title: chkValidCurrentSetOrDie.cmd
item.description: description Validates current settings details Checks if requested run current and standby current is less than max current and larger than 0. author Anders Sandstroem

item.title: chkValidVoltageSetOrDie.cmd
item.description: description Validates requested voltage details Ensure requested nominal voltage is less than max voltage and larger than 0 author Anders Sandstroem

item.title: general.cmd
item.description: description Add general PVs details Script for adding general and master diagnostics EPICS PVs author Niko Kivel, Anders Sandstroem

item.title: generalDiagnostics.cmd
item.description: description Script for general diagnostics details Script for setting default diagnostics author Niko Kivel, Anders Sandstroem

item.title: init.cmd
item.description: description Initialization script details Script for setting up the basic EPICS environment. author Niko Kivel, Anders Sandstroem

item.title: initAll.cmd
item.description: description Init main script details Script for setting up the basic EPICS environment. author Niko Kivel, Anders Sandstroem

item.title: initAxis.cmd
item.description: description init axis environment details Script for setting up the basic AXIS environment. author Niko Kivel, Anders Sandstroem

item.title: issueWarning.cmd
item.description: description Issue a warning details Generic verification script for expressions author Anders Sandstroem

item.title: verifyOrDie.cmd
item.description: description Generic verification script details Generic verification script for expressions author Anders Sandstroem
